title: Ko (Dagger-Axe)
description: The tang and part of the blade are executed in open work on this Kuo with socket. The composition is involved, with a tiger, which bites on a snake, standing on the neck and back of a bird that faces out from the blade. the body of the tiger is adorned along the back with a dragon figure in low relief. The larger surfaces are covered with granulation. Patina grey-green.
